heroTitle: Empowering Education, One Story at a Time
heroSubtitle: Shiksha Chaupal: Stories from the Ground
heroDescription: Grassroots women’s collectives are transforming education equity for young girls. Discover their untold stories and join the movement to amplify their impact.
step1Description: Capture the inspiring efforts of grassroots women’s collectives in improving education equity.
step2Description: Increase visibility and secure funding for these initiatives to scale their impact.
step3Description: Connect grassroots groups to share knowledge and grow collectively.

reports.title: Shiksha Chaupal: Reports from the Ground
reports.description: Grassroots women’s collectives are making a difference in education equity. Share your report or feedback to help us improve.

form.problem_faced: Problem Faced (Why girls are not coming to school)
